data.name: Immortal Truth
data.detailed_description:
Where is she? You call out her name. No reply. Oh God, where could she be? Wait— you've been here before. Or have you? Where are you? The darkness seems to engulf you. Are you even you? You can't stop sobbing. You search and search and search and search and search and search and search and search and search and search and...

Game Features:

  • Uncover the truth in a horrific and emotional story.
  • Solve puzzles and search for clues to piece together what happened.
  • Dynamic level design will have you questioning every step.
  • Original music, sound, and art stitch together the environment.

data.short_description: Immortal Truth is a psychedelic horror game about a father searching for his missing daughter. Sometimes what we're searching for isn't what is truly lost.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: 2 core processor with 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2600k or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 770 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
